Playing this game for 3000 hours be liek : 
* get boring , therefore :
- did not play this game for like 3 months aka retired(temporary)
-  play this game again 
- forgot to warm up 
- get called noob and useless because im bottom frag
Then , what is the meaning of this game lol i dont see a teamwork but instead i get insulted 

Adios ! CS GO , I'll see you in other side
Hılelerın onune gecebılseler daha ıyı olacak !!

Hi!
I got banned on this game which im suprised about because i did nothing wrong.
I did not break the rules and yet i get banned for absolutely nothing.
I didnt play this game for like three months and when i came back on i was banned.
I am not allowed too play this game while i bought prime. 
This is abosolutely ridicolous, please give me acces too this game again.
I had an high trust factor and was a legit part of the community. 
So sad too not be able too play one of my favourite games no more..
With kind regards,
Tim

Всем даров. Игра очень прикольная, затягивает как не в себя, но есть и очень плохой контент  читы, дизмараль, говно серв и многое другое. Ну как игра для убивания времени и поджигания вашего пердака очень подходит.
